analytic.title: The Place of Qualities in Porphyry’s Treatise On Principles and Matter and its Relationship to the Philosophy of the School of Bardaiṣan

body.bibl: Jurasz, Izabela. “The Place of Qualities in Porphyry’s Treatise On Principles and Matter and Its Relationship to the Philosophy of the School of Bardaiṣan.” In Porphyry in Syriac: The Treatise On Principles and Matter and Its Place in the Greek, Latin, and Syriac Philosophical Traditions, edited by Yury N. Arzhanov, 117–35. Philosophy and Sciences in the Christian Orient 1. Berlin: Walter de Gruyter, 2024.

Izabela Jurasz, The Place of Qualities in Porphyry’s Treatise On Principles and Matter and Its Relationship to the Philosophy of the School of Bardaiṣan,” in Porphyry in Syriac: The Treatise On Principles and Matter and Its Place in the Greek, Latin, and Syriac Philosophical Traditions, ed. Yury N. Arzhanov, Philosophy and Sciences in the Christian Orient 1 (Berlin: Walter de Gruyter, 2024), 117–35.
